name: Circuit Breaker
description: Circuit Breaker is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and red-black screen, it brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Equipped with sturdy foundry arms and legs, Circuit Breaker is a reliable companion in any situation. Its shades add a stylish flair to its appearance, making it stand out among its robotic peers. As a member of the WebtrES club, Circuit Breaker excels in technical skills and is always ready to assist its fellow club members.
